name: London-Laurel County Chamber of Commerce
description: The London-Laurel County Chamber of Commerce is the most effective business organization committed to helping improve the economic climate and quality of life in the London and Laurel County areas. They work jointly with city and county governments on projects that make the community a better place for everyone to live and work. The Chamber processes hundreds of potential relocation inquiries annually and handles thousands of calls for general information about London and Laurel County. They provide business networking opportunities, economic development support, community information, and work closely with the London-Laurel County Tourist Commission and Industrial Development Authority.
source: Verified from official Chamber website and multiple sources
eligibility_requirements: Open to businesses and individuals in London and Laurel County
fees: Membership fees vary by business type and size
notes: The Chamber is a non-profit organization supported by membership investments. They provide tornado relief resources and host signature events including the Annual Banquet and Golf Classic. The Chamber works with local government agencies and community organizations to promote economic growth and quality of life in the region.
